name: Gaucho Reloaded: Panic In The Pizza Zone
name_original: Gaucho Reloaded: Panic In The Pizza Zone
description:
You wake up trapped in some kind of interdimensional prison. A penguin explains the deal: deliver pizzas (by launching them at targets) to earn money. Spend the money on Steely Dan records. Deeper and deeper into the Dan discography. If you get deep enough, you might just escape...

Other than the items listed at the bottom, the art, code, idea, and the rest of the content were created by me from a Saturday morning to the next Monday evening, with a couple of bugfixes and packaging/release on Tuesday morning. This is the first "complete" game I've ever made and the first time I've ever done a game jam. I learned a lot, had a lot of fun, and am now ready to not use a computer for a few days :)

The music playing during the levels is a track I made years ago. The theme music was created by Nathan Micay.

I'm on Twitter: https://twitter.com/nah_solo

Other assets I used:

shader taken from here https://github.com/GDQuest/godot-shaders/tree/master/godot/Shaders

dialogue box from here https://github.com/Divirad/ADialogueBox

Sounds from here:

https://freesound.org/people/syseQ/sounds/267528/

https://freesound.org/people/Damirst/sounds/538791/
